content: Jessica! I hope this helps. Go to Mil.Com Home Page. Look for LOCATOR powered by Buddy Finder. Type in name..Elroy Smith. If you don't know the "branch" of service for sure, then choose All Branches. I found about 8 Elroy Smiths. Next choose the STATE you believe he resides in. Unfortunately, no PHOTOS were posted for "Elroy Smith" Good Luck! Hope you find him.
